messages.message: Hi @Eric Han Could you please help us with the above issue? We are running on a tight timeline and delivery schedule is right around the corner.
Will take a look later today. I remember we had this problem but it was fixed. Need to look back in git/slack history to find it
@Eric Han it very well might be, BoFA is on V23.01
could you help me check if this helps? https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C03HWN6BFC2/p1695750649392479?thread_ts=1695657797.824679&cid=C03HWN6BFC2
@Eric Han I believe that is a separate issue. I am not doing recompute. The metrics are 0 from initial accuracy calculation.

sorry I’m not sure if I fully understand. When you say “goldens generated via …” do you mean that the flow review results that the goldens were generated from were from run with these different input folders?

@Eric Han apologies, I could definitely be more clear.

There are two ways to select the input folder when running a flow.
1. You can select an input folder via the dropdown - these are inputs that have been copied / added to the flow. (Shown in the red box)
2. You can select any folder as an input folder via the file explorer. (Shown in the blue box)
If (1) is used to generate the goldens, the name in the golden excel would be `filename_0`

If (2) is used to generate the goldens, the name in the golden excel would be `filename.pdf_0`

@Elan Sharony This is definitely something we fixed because the behavior is no longer there on dogfood. I can’t find the exact PR though.

@eddie.hou can these goldens be regenerated once we merge the fix in?
@Eric Han I fixed the underlining excel file so it's not blocking me.
Yeah this was already fixed but may have not been backported to 23.01. I’ll check it out and get that set up
